title: About
paragraphs: I am a Senior Software Engineer with a strong foundation in full-stack development, particularly skilled in React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. My professional journey includes significant contributions at Guidewire Software, where I have been recognized for my technical expertise and collaborative spirit.

Beyond my technical role, I am actively involved in the Toastmasters community. Serving as the Registration Chair for the 'Illuminate 2024 Semi Annual Conference' of Division I, District 120, and receiving the Contributor Award from Wake-Up Chennai Toastmasters Club, reflect my commitment to personal growth and leadership.
I am passionate about continuous learning and community engagement, always seeking opportunities to grow and contribute meaningfully.
